name: Street Isolation
description:
You've been confined for too long, your friend calls you and proposes going for a walk and having some fun, but the  police are everywhere!
Sneak past the cops, find your friend and return home, undetected!

This game was made during a weekend for the Game JamOn 2020, with the theme "A portrait of the current situation".

With it we try to bring attention to the consequences of evading confinement and social distancing measures during the COVID-19 pandemic.

It features automatic language selection, between English and Spanish.

A game by Virtual Phenix Games :

Micah Paul Davis Duke  of Design 🤴

Manuel Rodriguez Count of Code 🎖️ // Manurocker95

Javier Salcedo  Viceroy of VFX 👑 // LudusEstArs

Ricardo Barajas Archmage of Art 🧙//  Barryck
